title: Small and Beautiful
review: It's a small and beautiful temple in the heart of nainital city.

title: Must Visit Place
review: Must Visit Place, Awesum feeling, at the bank of naini lake. Cold brezze,surrounding by mountains. Always feel patriotic

title: A visit to temple is always good.
review: No trip is complete without a visit to the famous temple at the place you visit.

title: Ancient Nice temple
review: Ancient temple on the banks of  lake.Nice temple to Divine Mother along with small temples to Hanuman ji,Shiva ,Vishnu.

title: Where the bells toll all day...
review: If you are in Nainital and stop to take a break from the bustling Mall Road and ceaseless chatter, not many moments will pass before you hear a bell toll from the Naina Devi temple. The temple is located beside Naini Lake and is as popular amongst tourists as the locals. The temple is a five-minute walk towards Capitol Cinema from the rickshaw stand on Mall Road. There are two small shops near the temple entrance from where you can buy prasad. You might have to ask for flowers and diya separately. You can find a shoe stand to the left after descending the steps leading to the temple complex and taps to wash your hands to the right.

title: Temple
review: This temple gives you a feel of Nepal constructed in such a way. beside the Naini lake and Shopping Market

title: Divine Place
review: The Mandir is on the bank of the lake. A beautiful & peace place. The Mandir Complex is neat & clean.

title: A temple in the surroundings as it would be!
review: Visit this place with a devotional interest. A calm place facing Naina Lake ignites the devotional side of your soul. Accompanied with worship places for Lord Shiva, Lord Hanuman, it is a perfect place you can spent one hour to calm you mind from routine stresses of life.

title: Very Nice Temple
review: - The temple is located very near to Mall road and can be easily reached by ricksaw. Ricksaw takes Rs 20 for a ride on mall road.

title: Near the nainital lake
review: Families can visit , as its near to the nainital lake and the main parade practice ground . Near bazaar

title: Nice place...
review: good place to go if you are religious. I liked the place a  lot, it was nice temple and good views ouside

title: Temple
review: Good place to have daran of the goddess. It has historical significance. All visit the place. Most easily assessable.

title: Must visit
review: I visited this temple in the evening. Nice illumination will attract you. You should visit it early morning or in the evening. Too much congested.

title: Must visit
review: Nanitaal name is bcoz of this temple. One of the eyes of devi had fallen here. On the bank of the lake. gud view and nicel maintained

title: Like any other temple
review: Like any other temple, a fair is organized starting from 6th of Sep 2016 on the stadium grounds, so if you are planning now you may end up enjoying the fair too...

title: Very crowded and loud
review: This one's for the dedicated devotees. If you are one, then you wouldn't mind the rush of people streaming into the temple or pooling out of the premises. But if you are one of those are just there to enjoy some scenic beauty may want to avoid because it is crowded and those loud (read very very loud) public audio systems shouts out some holy music that may be noise to some of you.

title: Gratifying
review: This serene place is situated at bank of naini lake. Must visit place along the tibetan market, one can also offer prayer from another corner of the lake at entry of mall road.

title: Temple on the banks of Nainital Lake
review: One of the biggest attractions in Nainital. This mandir is situated next to the lake on malital side. connected with bhotia market and an excellent place to spend time,

title: Siddh peeth
review: Naina Devi temple is one of the Siddh Peeth as it is said that the various part of Devi body  was thrown in various places. So it is the place where one part of body fell as it's clear by her name.

title: Beautifull
review: This place is really very nice .... temple and its surrounding is also very nice ,Maa naina devi mandir is nice . also you can go in many different places . visit 7 talls . we enjoyed natural beauty .. calm whether .

title: HOLY PLACE
review: This place is sichuyeted bank of naini lack near tibbat market this place maa naina devi tempal so beautyful naini lack seen so amezing seen form tempal compoun

title: Nani temple
review: It is temple which gave the name to nanital. Located by the side of temple is mosque church and gurdwara.Lovely temple on mall road on the bank of lake.

title: must visit near naini lake!
review: i makeit a point every time i am in near by area to visit this temple.it provides termendous peace to mind and aoul!

title: “Must visit in Nainital”
review: Never seen so well managed temple. Very clean, organised and ideally located. Must visit. Close to Naini lake.

title: Nice Place
review: The place was good and the view of nainital lake was increasing its beauty but there was dirt on the floor. But must visit to know the history behind the place.

title: Naina Devi Temple
review: By the side of the lake is Naina Devi Temple, great attraction and must see place. Aarti in the evening is amazing

title: Must Visit!!
review: A must visit Temple for your Nainital Trip. Take the "Besan Laddos" for Prasad from the shops outside, those will just melt in your mouth and enjoy the view of Naini Lake from the Temple's deck.

title: awesom temple of naina devi.peoples come here and ask to naina devi and she will surely make it happen.
review: whenever you will go in nainital you will get anything that you would required at any time even in night also.

title: Nice temple on the banks of the lake
review: This temple is situated right on the banks of the Nainital lake. The city and the lake has got its name from this temple only.

title: Perfect view
review: Temple is on d lake side. Perfect view of the mountains from d temple. Though it was very crowded in d temple.

title: As a couple went there to have blessings of Maa Naina Devi
review: Went there to have blessing for peace health happiness prosperity and good karma, it was peaceful and in lap of nature next to lake naini, feeled blessed and calmed our senses

title: Powerful and famous temple.
review: must visit temple as it is shakthipeet lso.nice view of naina lake.roadside market is far better than mall road outside the temple..

title: Soothing atmosphere
review: One cannot really have more reasons to visit a sacred place other than to devote their prayers to God and  Goddess. But at Naina Devi temple, you can spend good couple of hours enjoying the soothing surroundings, Naini lake, greenery and some time at peace. To satiate hunger pangs, local food joints are easily accessible in temple proximity.

title: Goddess Naina Devi temple
review: This temple is worth visiting as it has got great importance. One must visit and offer prayer to Naina Goddess.

title: maa
review: situated near naine  lake  on the  mall road  ,must visit  to thanks  shakti  for giving u chance to be near the nature ,if u r healthy only than u can enjoy.very  nice soothing  evening arti ,pandits  use drum beats and other intruments during the arti but people stats  ringing bells and that definately disturb the actual traditional   rithyum ,if people stops ringing bells for a while i think one can fully enjoy the rhythum of music during the arti , mandir is very neat full of greenry , u can enjoy  feeding fishes in lake and shopping in tibbet  market  outside the temple.

title: Must visit when you are in Nainital.
review: If you are in nainital then you must visit this temple. The temple has very auspicious value for the local and the visitors. The view of the lake is awesome from the temple. And it looks even more beautiful in night. This temple is just adjacent to the market.

title: Devine Place
review: Devine place on the bank of naini lake! picture perfect place to visit.The market place around the temple will remind you that you are at hill station.

title: Maa
review: Make a sure visit whenever you are in Nainital very peaceful and u can feel the power of goddess there and you can spend lot of time watching nani lake ...

title: Divine temple. Amazing location
review: The Naina Devi temple is dedicated to local deity and has a divine ambiance. Your visit to Nainital is incomplete without a visit to this temple.

title: Old historic place
review: Visited Naina Devi Temple, Nainital in the afternoon of 30-June-2016. Weather was very humid, but pleasant. A number of tourists were there. The cleanliness in circulating area needs attention. Rubber mats at Main Mandir stairs pinch on stepping over it. Need to be replaced with softer ones with smaller holes.

title: PRAY TO GOD IS ALWAYS GOOD
review: Reaching Naina Devi Temple either via Mall Road by walking to Temple or while boating, ask boat man drop at Naina Devi Temple. At the drop point near naina Devi Temple, you may be able to see small fishes which you can feed their food.

title: Nice place to spent some time for worship
review: Must go temple . Naini lake surroundings are fabulous. Nice greenery. Yes you are in tibbatian market too for some shopping.

title: Temple located at Excellent location
review: The temple is located next to Gurudwara. Entrance is from Tibetan Market. Cool and calm place and gives a nice view of Lake.

title: Naina Devi Temple
review: Naina devi temple is one of the most popular temple in Nainital. It is connected to the famous Naini Lake and very close to Mall Road.

title: Temple close to the Nainital Lake
review: The temple is located on the shore of the lake and provides good view of the Nainital lake. Suitable for spiritual and nature lovers.

title: Worship place
review: This is the best spot in Nainital. This temple is on the Naini Lake. It is a beautiful temple of Naina devi, it also has a hanuman, shivji, navgrah, radha krishna and ram temple in it. It's of great importance as said that what ever you wish for comes true if you go to visit this temple and tie a bell or a red cloth on a tree there, but I purely visit it because of the solace I get there.

title: Beautiful, clean and temple built in open
review: One of the best temples I have ever seen, built amidst the popular Tibetan market. The temple offers a breathtaking view of the lake. Its neat and clean and well maintained.

title: Nice mandir with nice location
review: Nice mandir with nice location and very beautiful view towards nani lake and you can also feel peace inside the temple

title: Traditional and a must visit
review: The entrance is hidden between big hoardings and extended shops, difficult to find, but a must visit, The temple is clean, nicely maintained and has very good view of the lake and city. Shops near the temple are reasonable (yes, they do bargain)

title: Shrine temple of Naina Devi
review: Good Temple of Goddess Naina Devi.. Along with it Lord Shiva Temple & Lord Hanuman temple.. Good spvce inside the temple.. Just touching with Naina Lake fdrom where u can see Fishes in lakes as well. U can gave them their foods to eat..

title: Serene Place.
review: Offer your prayers at naina devi temple and get the blessings of Maa Naina Devi. One can have a great view of Naini Lake from the temple.

title: Nice temple
review: Temple has own history. Many people visit here with faith. You can feel peace in the temple. Temple also located on beautiful palce.

title: Nicely maintained temple
review: The temple complex is by the lake and near to tibetan market. It is neatly maintained. Lots of small temples in this complex.

title: Cool temple at a busy market place
review: Well it's an famous and an old temple right at a very busy shopping centre in nainital, situated right next to d lake.. a major advantage is that this is located right at the only parking place in nainital .. the build is clean and it's a good devotional place to visit

title: Scenic view of lake in the background... Divine place in chaos
review: Must Visit. The temple is situated on the border of Nainital Lake. There is a small cluster of temples in the area which includes Linga temple and Hanumanji temple. The lake view is beautiful from this place. You enjoy ringing the bells placed at many locations in the temple. It is close to Tibetan Market and Mall road. You may plan the visit in evening and later on you can enjoy strolling in mall road and do shopping.

title: Beautiful Temple
review: Do not miss this if you are in Nainital. Little offbeat in terms of location but I have never seen so many bells at one place !

title: Spiritual
review: Some bit of history and faith in the temple.  Must visit,  it is right there in the city centre. There is also a great view of the lake from one of the corner.

title: Temple nainadevi pls.do.visit
review: Neat and clean temple near nainilake. You will get relaxed due to ambience pf temple. Nearby there is tibbet market. Its good. You will find gurudwara mosque amd church also.

title: naina devi mandir with regards
review: naina devi mandir is located at tibetian market with crowd and congestion also on nainital lake with business area and parking facility

title: Naina Devi Temple
review: It is a beautiful temple on the banks of Nainital Lake. As most of the temples on the hills are ancient, this temple also has been there for ages. Photography is aloowed in the premises, but not inside the inner chambers. It can be visited in a short time of 15-20 minutes. Boating can be enjoyed in the adjoining Nainital Lake.

title: Temple on Lake side
review: Temple,  gurdwara and masjid so nearby to each other says a lot about the place.

title: This is the kind of temple that I love!!
review: Beautiful, located right at the edge of Naini Lake. This temple exudes a calm aura as soon as you enter it.

title: Nice temple on the lake
review: This one is visited by lot of tourist as it just next to the lake...For faithful, this is must visit.

title: Beautiful Temple near Lake
review: Beautiful temple near Naini Lake where u can spend some good time..Its near to the Tibetan Market where u can enjoy shopping.

title: Temple
review: This is divine temple of Goddess Naina Devi. You should seek her blessings while you are in Nainital.

title: A famous small temple besides the naini lake
review: The visit to this place is must if you are in Nainital, you can stroll around the lake road to reach this place within 20-30 mins. A nice temple clean and closely banked with one side of the lake. Though at time it  quite the busy temple but you can enquire with locals if you prefer to take your own time visiting this place.

title: Peace at Naina Devi Mandir!!
review: Naina devi mandir is just besides the lake near tibetian market and gives you absolute peace in middle of such crowd.

title: Old Temple
review: must to visit, view of the lake is awesome from here. Kids enjoy the lots of fish near the side wall

title: Very nice temple
review: Must visit before you start your day in Nainital. Well maintained site with nice view of Naini lake.

title: Religious Place
review: Must visit as it is having a very strong historic significance of Goddess Durga. Nice peaceful place which gives you calm and poise while visiting.

title: Shrine of Devi Naina Devi
review: Naina Devi temple is considered to be one of 64 Shakti Peeths. The temple is situated on the end of Nainital lake offering a wonderful view of Lake from the temple itself. The temple was destroyed in 1880's land slide and it was rebuilt.

title: Nice place
review: Located at the one end of Naini lake. Temple is clean and a nice experience to visit. There is a local market just outside the temple.

title: Goddess Naina Devi on the banks of Nainital
review: This Naina devi temple is situated on the banks of Nainital.  Nainital is named after Naina Devi.  Visit this temple for blessing of Naina Devi.

title: Jai Naina Devi
review: We visit twicw the said holly place and surpirsed to look that an Gurdawara and Masjid is situtaed around the temple.

title: Its a shaktipeeth with amazing location.
review: Felt mesmerized when I visited this temple and worshipped the Goddess. Its believed Goddess Shakti's left eye fell into naini lake, along the bank of which it is located. Amazing location of this temple. Its is completely surrounded by hills and naini lake on one side. Mall road with so many shops on the outside premises of this powerful temple. A must visit to seek blessing from the Goddess.

title: Naina Devi - Goddess of the valley
review: Naina Devi Temple is located on the edge of the Naini lake and a must visit place for all the travelers. After the goddess blessing you can also feel the nature lap while roaming in the backyard of the temple. The breeze over the lake will surely amaze you.

title: Nice place to visit @ Nainital
review: A nice and clean temple complex and also possibly the best place to admire the lake if not boating, with a very good view of the lake.

title: Shakti Peeth
review: Shri Naina Devi Temple is also known as Mahishapeeth because of defeat of demon Mahishasur by the Goddess.

title: Dr
review: It's good to see and understand how the city has a beautiful mythological past.  Temple being it's evidence.

title: Naina Devi near Naini lake
review: Nice place to visit.

title: naina devi temple
review: The attractive lake of Nainital is said to be the eyes of Sati,consort of Lord Shiva.Sati emulated herself in to the sacrificial fire after being severely insulted.

title: Naina Devi Temple By The Lake
review: Its a very nice place. Temple is right next to the sailing-club and the Naini Lake. Its almost to the end of the main-road, so you can take a rick @ 20-30/- . Beautiful landscape can be enjoyed from this temple. There are lot of vendors outside selling cheap-stuffs which one can buy; or do some shopping in the Tibet Market right next to the temple.

title: Temple near Lake
review: Great place

title: Naina...Great Goddess of Nainital
review: The goddess is ' staying' at very unique location..It's about the mall road end.The whole mall road is fabulous and full of attractions..always..And this Goddess adds one more live attraction in it. The goddess's house is decorated in such beautiful manner that not only little one's but even the elderly people gets thrilled..After visiting all the temples in the Goddess's house..you can leisure at the cool place towards Naini lake..full of unforgettable enjoyment with the younger one's in family...

title: Good Place for Visit
review: Nice place for visit, Near Temple big Tibbatian Market and good place for Cheap and Best Good. Must visit here and Enjoy.

title: Naini devi temple
review: The temple is located just next to the lake. Must visit when you are in nainital. There is market situated just outside the temple.

title: Divine atmosphere @ evening aarti
review: This is a must visit if you are in Nainital and best time I feel is during the evening aarti. I was very fortunate to experience divine atmosphere at the aarti.

title: Must visit when in Nainital
review: I was avoiding to go in as u need to remove ur shoes but passing through the temple everyday and not going in was troubling Indian belief in me. So went in on the last day of the visit and thanked Goddess for inviting in. It is a beautiful temple with other dieties in the side temples. U get good Darshan and Prasad.

title: Excellent
review: Very clean and peaceful temple by the lake. The temple has a revered history and is a must visit for anyone.

title: Very very clean temple
review: I think its one of the cleanest hindu temple. It has great view and you can experience the divine. Do you visit this place its near to lake.

title: Great Temple, Must Visit
review: Nice temple on the banks of naini lake. One can enjoy boating in the lake and then go to the temple. The temple is very neat and clean properly maintained. Not too much of crowd. You can take the prasad from the shops outside the temple. After visiting the temple one can also go for shopping in the tibetan market just adjoining the temple.

title: Not my kinds
review: We not into gods so didn't appeal ..pretty ordinary n one can't miss it coz as tourists ur bound yo waltz pass this zone ..it being prime location for tourist congregation at square .

title: Very good Temple
review: Nainital name is derived from goddess Naini devi which means eye in english.

title: If you are too religious then do visit
review: Well as the heading makes it clear if you are a true follower of Mata Rani you should visit it. Temple is small and located inside the crowded market with capitol cinema and Tibetan market flanking it.

title: 15th Century Temple
review: It was originally constructed in the 15th century during the Kushan reign,the temple faced massive destruction it went through after a massive destruction it went through after a huge landslip hit Nainital in 1880,it rebuilt in 1883.It is very famous temple of Naina Devi is considered to be extremely sacred and pres tine by the devotees.

title: Nice temple
review: Nice temple to visit..must for temple visitors..appeared made up recently..very neat and clean..nearby hanumanji temple is there to visit

title: A must visit for everyone coming to Nainitaal.....
review: The name of the place Nainitaal is told to be derived from the name of Goddess Naina Devi. Its a ritual spot but no doubt a feelgood one.

title: Must Visit.
review: Anyone going to Nainital must visit Naina Devi Temple and take the blessings. The temple is situated at the end of the Mall Road and the evening Aarti was very good.

title: Beautiful temple
review: It is one of the shaktipeeth of mata among 52. It is best known for mata eyes. it is also very beautiful place to visit.

title: The Divine Goddess
review: Goddess of the town after which the town is named. A famous temple with a great view of the lake and a place to spend some time in peace.

title: Jai Mata Di !!
review: No words to say...

title: Spirituality and scenic beauty simultaneously...
review: If your are visiting Nainital, you should visit this temple. Visiting this temple would give you peace as well as a break from that sight seeing thing ;) ... plus, you will get a breath taking view of the Naini Lake from the temple premises. You won't get that beautiful look from any other side(Except Naina Peak).

title: Overcrowded Locality
review: Seems more like a business centre than a house of prayer. With loads of hawkers all around the temple, the temple is barely visible. Makes one wonder if people visit the place to shop or pray...

title: Good temple besides lake
review: While enjoying the Nainital lake, we were looking out for Naina Devi temple but the same was not traceable. We found the temple after a few enquiries.

title: Good to visit before evening roam around in mall road.
review: This temple is near to mall road , nainital and  good place to visit. You can go there after the boating ride and then you can visit the tibbetan market which is inside the temple area.

title: Naini Devi Temple by the Lake
review: The temple complex is right at one side of the lake behind the Tibetean Market. The place is ok to visit, nothing very outstanding.

title: Great Spiritual place
review: Do not miss the evening Arati - there is not a huge rush, but the Arati in the evening next to the lake is worth the time...

title: Pretty temple by the lake
review: Quite a pretty temple by the lakeside. Not dirty like usual temples. Has little flora which looks very nice.

title: Like any other place of worship in India
review: Worth a visit because it is a holy place. Thank God it not swarmed by beggars and Charlatan Swamis like in many other temples of India...

title: Won't take much time
review: This is right after Tibetan market. Won't take much of your time and you don't have to go specially to this place. It is in dead center of Nainital. Right beside the lake. The view of Nainital from the Temple compound is great. Standing right next to the lake, you can actually see yourself surrounded by mountains.

title: Good
review: Really spacious & inspiring place along naini lake with mountain nearby. U can sit & pray in peace. Shops outside sell all puja realted material.

title: Beside Nainital lake
review: This is a very peaceful, clean and beautiful temple located beside Naini lake...it is about 5 min walk from Mallital( I think ?) end of Mall Road !!

title: Nainital trip
review: Naina devi temple is just beside nainital lake....Standing right next to the lake, you can actually see yourself surrounded by mountains.

title: Divine blessings
review: Nainital is a beautiful place, blessed by Goddess Naina Devi. It is a very old temple situated very close to the mall road. Had a perfect start to my day after seeking Naina Devi's blessings

title: divine
review: it near end of mall road, facing naini lake .one can visit on thier trip to nainital . no queqe for darshan

title: Very good temple
review: nice temple at the banks of the Naini lake. Peacefull & fulfilling experience. Can visit this after boat ride in the lake.

title: very good temple
review: Good temple and heart of nainital. This temple is very religious and historical place for visitors. Great view of lake side and good place for blessing

title: Temple.
review: this is situated near the mall road in the lap of mountains surroundings the Naini lake adjacent to Bhotia Market. a small but neatly clean temple.

title: Beautiful Temple
review: Naina Devi temple is really beautiful. We went there in the evening during aarti time and the reflection of the temple's light on the lake combined with the sounds of the temple's gongs is an experience in itself. Its located right in the Bhutia Market, a must visit for shoppers in Nainital

title: Beautiful
review: Beautiful temple right beside the lake at the end of the mall road. There is Tibetan market right beside it.

title: A MUST VISIT TO THIS DIVINE PLACE
review: The name of the city is named after Naina Devi... The temple is situated right in the middle of the city just besides the lake. The evening aarti of Naina Devi at the temple is simply unforgettable. I was fortunate enough to carry my handycam in which I recorded the Aarti of Goddess Naina Devi and it is very refreshing to watch the Aarti again and again and it gives you peace and strength. Make it sure to visit the temple during Arti time in the evening and I can assure you that you will never forget the experience in your life. The memory will remain with you forever. The visit to the temple during Durga Pooja infact increases the pleasure. The light decoration of the temple during Durga Puja and the reflection of the illuminated temple in the Naini Lake is something which cannot be explained in words.

title: Holy Place
review: Holy Place of Goddess Naina Devi along with Lord Hanuman & other God Idols. Situated beside Lake Nainital.

title: Claim temple
review: this temple is located on mattial and near tibateen market. go if you are spiritual. Adventurous traveler can opt out.

title: Good temple
review: Nice temple on the lake side with a market too. Surroundings are clean and place is peaceful. Outside there are lot of shops to buy woollens etc. Children liked it a lot as well.

title: Good Place to Visit
review: It is alongside Mall road and Naini lake. So you can choose to walk over there and pay a visit. Best time to go there is evening time.

title: Significance of Nainital
review: A stroll down the Mall road in Nainital will lead you to a place where wallets and worship come to use. Here you will find a Bhutia Market or Tibetian Market as they call mostly shops with clothing and candles and other sundry stuff. Nothing interesting but regular street side stuff here. And as the market ends you come out to the Naina Devi Temple. A calm place where you can spent some quality time understanding the history of this temple.

title: Awesome Temple
review: This is a great temple on the banks of the Naini Lake at Mallital. Good ambiance and quite divine and peaceful!!

title: Very peaceful and comforting
review: Visit to Mata Naina Devi temple was very peaceful. Premises are very neat and clean thanks to the plastic ban. Very well structured and maintained. You can even take pictures without any issues. Just behind temple you can see Naini lake. Also there is a way to go to Shree Hanuman ji temple from temple.

title: Beautiful temple besides the lake
review: One can hear the chanting of bells on the lake. They can be heard from a distance even when one is taking a stroll on mall road or boating at a good distance away.

title: The reason why it is called Nainital!
review: This temple is located near Tibetian market and few minute walk from Mall road.

title: Spirituality at its best!!
review: Very neat and clean temple...Perfect scenic view...Peaceful environment...A must visit for anyone visiting Nainital.

title: Beautiful relegious temple
review: Goddess Durga is worshiped here. From the Hindu mythology here the eye of Sati fell and hence it is a Sati pitha place of worship.

title: Very Peaceful temple
review: Mata Naina Devi temple is very peaceful.atmosphere is so calm n spiritual.Situated near Naini lake.must visit place during naintal visit.

title: Trip to Nainital & Corbet
review: Will rate Good. Between Average & Very Good. Nice Temple near Lake. We were there during Aarti time in evening. As it just near lake no extra effort is needed to visit. So one must see this.

title: Naina Devi Temple
review: this is one of the place you should visit when you are in nainital.  As the name of nainital comes from the naina devi this is worth visiting and deveotional

title: Peaceful temple beside Naini Lake
review: Naina Devi temple is very peaceful and situated on lake itself.

title: Beautiful temple
review: This temple not only have religious values also have great view which calm you soul

title: Naina Devi temple - A Beautiful, Spiritual Experience, don't miss the evening Aarti
review: Naina Devi temple is adjacent to Nainital lake and should be visible from most parts of Nainital. It's at the end of Mall Road and it's at a pretty much walkable distance from the start of the Mall Road.

title: First place to go in Naintal
review: Its the first place where everybody should go and take the blessing . The location is simply awesome .

title: Blissfully Peacefull
review: This temple is dedicated to Goddess Nayna..they say its a spot where Goddess Sati eyes fell, hence the name. Situated at the end of Naini Lake, this temple is really serene, positive and peacefull. The moment you enter the vicinity of this temple a calming aura of the place take over your senses & certain lightness and calmness is experienced. A truely Must visit !

title: The ruling deity of Nainital
review: A good place to visit and offer your respect and prayers. This ancient temple is perfectly located at the top of the Naini lake with a fairly clean courtyard offering panoramic views.

title: Goddess Naina Devi Temple
review: This beautiful temple is located adjacent to the lake and is also one of the Shaktipeets in India. The temple complex is neat and clean with a peaceful and serene atmosphere. This temple is also very popular with locals.

title: Devotional Visit
review: It is in close proximity to Nainital lake with a good plaza type small area with lots of eatout , fashion shops and articulate shops around with a big Gurudwara.

title: Naina Devi Temple
review: A simple serene temple with a fantastic location right at the edge of the picturesque Nainital Lake.  I particularly liked the bells and the balcony jutting out to the lake view.  The Nainadevi statute is unique and is very peaceful to look at.

title: A Hindu place of pilgrimage
review: Naina Devi temple is located at bank of Nainital Lake. You can spend an hour over their. From temple premises scenic is beautiful. Bhotia market is near by temple, so you can do shopping if you want. Gurdwara Shiri Guru Singh Sabha is very close to Naina Devi temple. If you want to feed fishes bring some bread. Lots of fishes are waiting  for u. Be aware from pick pocket :(

title: Mania Devi temple
review: Situated along the banks of the Naintal lake, it has a calm ambiance and a must visit during a visit to Nainital.

title: Devine!!!! Jai Maa
review: Must visit if in Nainital. On the banks of the Lake (Tallitaal), it seems floating Temple. mesmerizing at Night. Specially people from Metros will really love the peace in the temple. We visited during Durga Pooja & Ram Navami. There were lot of devotees in the temple but unlike in Delhi, we could do the pooja so  peacefully. I was so satisfied & content by Darshan.

title: Naina Devi Temple Best Tample  In Nainital
review: naina devi temple  is located in naini lake . naina devi temple location is so peas full . people can see all nainital view from tallital to mall road from temple .  every day all local & tourist are doing Arti  naina devi  7:00 P.M.

title: Beautiful temple by Naini lake
review: Beautiful temple beside Naini Lake. A must visit for those who visit Nainital to seek Goddess's blessings.

title: Naina devi temple
review: Temple and small and clean. You can walk till the end of the mall road to reach here. Nearby Tibetan market is also good. walkable from mall road

title: Goddess Naina Devi
review: Its a good temple, Near to naini lake. good to visit.

title: Temple visit
review: It is a very powerful temple. The Devi has given the name to the city itself, like in cases of Shimla (Shyamala Devi), Chandigarh (Chandi Devi) etc.

title: Nice temple
review: the temple is nice and you will relaxed once you are inside the temple. Nice location and well maintained

title: Spiritual seekers
review: Visit this place in the busy hustle bustle of the town. Would recommend visiting this place if you are not shopaholic and a little spiritual.

title: Clean little temple
review: It's very easy to locate, walk to, situated right next to the Lake, boating club, and next to the Tibetan Market. Very clean place, and calm. May be a bit crowded during season, I guess.

title: Remember to take a walk to temple....Peaceful place!!!
review: The Naina devi temple is located in the Mallital end of the lake. It holds the dignity of being the ruling deity of Kumaon region in Uttarakhand. The temple compound provides unobstructed view of the Nainital lake. One needs to remove the shoes before entering the temple. Taking photograph of the goddess is prohibited however photography of nature and self is allowed. Visit the Goddess from whose name the lake and the town had been named.There is peace and tranquility in the temple premises.Things I liked most are cleanliness and peaceful location.Recommend you to be there in the evening and remember to take a walk from your hotel as you will be able to enjoy the beauty and feel the love of your near and dear one.

title: Peaceful
review: Its one of the main temple in naintal located close to lake.Its quite peaful & must visit place.Itss centrally located, good divine place, Can be visited anytime during day or evening.

title: Nina Devi temple
review: small tample located on the quiet side of the lake,

title: Naina devi Temple Visit
review: We visited the Naina Devi Temple dated 15 Feb,2016. We feel the peace & relax in the temple. You can also take a advantage of boating in Nani Lake. Near the temple Mosque, Gurudwara & Church is available. So this place is not only for Hindu region, all comunity can visit this place in Nanitaal.

title: Located by the serene lake
review: The temple houses Naina Devi and is located at the corner of Naini Lake. Offers great view of the lake and the Mall Road. Do visit the place after sunset and experience the inner peace.

title: Superb for an evening & Early Morning Pray
review: We went to place in the evening, there is ultimate view of Nainital Lake near the entry of the temple.

title: Devbhumi Nainital
review: The place is so beautiful surrounded by Naini lake. This temple is one the best temples I have visited. Well maintained. I found peace in this place. A lot of visitors visit the place. i joined the beautiful evening Aarti in the temple. So devotional place. This place also has Mosque, Gurudwara & Church nearby. Lovely combination to tell God is One. Jai ho!!

title: Very clean,great view
review: The temple is located just on the lake.very clean and scenic. I went in April it was very less crowded.I won't be able to comment on other months.There was hardly any queue for worshipping goddess.This is the best thing which I liked there.

title: very ggod temple
review: goddess naina devi temple is very old since 18th century............... every morning and evening aii people are prying

title: Beautiful Location and temple
review: Temple is located at the bank of Nani lake, Temple location and view of mountains and lake is really beautiful. You will like to stay there for sometime.

title: Nice, clean and pure
review: This temple of Naina Devi is beautifully located by the lake and gives you an amazing view of the entire city.

title: Serene Place !
review: whenever we stay in nainital , we come to the temple almost daily.  Just watch the fishes from inside the temple.   There is a aarti timing daily.  serene and peaceful place.

title: Peaceful and nice temple
review: One of the main attraction of Nainital. Must visit to place if you are there. Temple is not very big but quit peaceful. this is not on mountain so can be visited by elderly and small childrens

title: Clean small nice temple
review: Great location. You can get your boat ride dropped here as well. It's right next to Tibetian market. Local shopping eating and a nice temple visit can all be combined. Temple is small quiet super clean as well.

title: Place of worship
review: Main presiding deity of Nainital town - from which the name Nainital is derived.

title: Good place to worship, situated near lake
review: It is a religious place. It is situated at corner side of lake. It is must visit for every person who visits Nainital. Temple is small but well maintained. The temple has idols of multiple Gods. You will find lot of peace inside temple. I will surely recommend this.

title: Must visit place
review: We went in off season and luckily mandir was not crowded with people. Premises were neat and clean but nothing much exciting about the place.

title: naina devi
review: Naina devi temple is just near the nainitaal lake .it is a religious place and very peaceful and attractive

title: Location is its USP
review: Just another temple..

title: God's temple
review: Gods blessings. Neat and clean temple. Nice location to have a view of Lake. The place is named after the deity Naini devi

title: nice hill station temple
review: small and nicew temple at the end of the naini lake. approcable and wthout any entry fee or brokers.

title: The Main Temple in Nainital
review: This temple is dedicated to Naina Devi. It is located on the edge of the lake and gives a beautiful view of the lake. The temple whilst not architecturally significant is definitely worth the visit. It is very clean and well maintained and generally not crowded, hence the darshan can be done quickly. A peaceful atmosphere prevails in the temple and we found our darshan there very rewarding experience.

title: Jai Mataji....
review: Goddess temple on Lake Side... Nice devotional place..... Must visit once if you are in Nainital.....  Jay Mataji......

title: Naina devi
review: Name of Nainital has been originated from Naini Devi Temple , Beautiful Temple located on edge of Naini Lake which is an eye shaped lake , it is said that eay of Devi Sati fell here , when Lord Shiva was carrying her body while ding Tandava , Darshan of Naina Devi gives you great power & energy

title: Naina Devi Temple in Nainital
review: This temple in Nainital is situated at Mallital point of the lake near the tibetan market and dedicated to Godeddess Naina Devi. It's believed that the eye (Nayan in Sanskrit) of SATI fell here, hence the name Naina Devi. The temple complex has a Devi Durga idol. However, as per architectural beauty, this temple is ordinary.

title: Naina Devi Temple
review: Located at premier location of Nainital .i.e at Mallital point near lake.

title: Devbhoomi...
review: A place where ur wish comes true... if u pray by all your heart... and by focusing your mind.... in this temple.... you will find happiness and a new power inside your body..... try it....

title: Complete peace of mind
review: At the bank of Naini Lake Mata Naina Devi Mandir is adjacent to Tibetan Market. There is no panda or unwanted person. For offering puja, best time is early morning. Very neat and tidy and well maintained place. You can see schools of fishes in the lake. A never miss religious place.

title: Peaceful and clean Temple
review: Beautiful temple which is well maintained and kept very neat and clean. Just at the banks of Nainital Lake, it overlooks the entire lake.

title: A very clean and seren temple
review: Although not one of those awe-inspiring architectures, the temple is maintained very clean and green. It has idols of a number of Hindu Gods. Worth a visit to see how clean and organised temples can be

title: in my to do list in nainital :)
review: The temple is on the other side of the lake. it has around 3 temples in the same area. we were there one before dassera so it was really nice as we got to see the whole parade where they finish the ramleela and go to burn the ravana. Outside the mandir there is lot of cheap shopping that one can do.i think mostly the stuff is from tibet or nepal.

title: Beautiful
review: The temple situated on the lakeside is one of the landmarks of the town. It is clean, well maintained and provides a good view of the lake.

title: Divine!!
review: What can one say more about a temple which is at one of the edge of a beautiful lake. Good place, clean and serene environment. Must go...

title: Gav devi ...must read story of godess from eyes of sati
review: This is one of the most beautiful temple on the lake side... one of the best scenery and spiritual place  ...this is must visit location for this hill station

title: Goddess NAINA DEVI
review: A must go place. Peacefull temple on bank of naini lake. It can be felt by going as feeling is indescribable.

title: Naina Devi Temple
review: Naina Devi Temple is at the banks of Nainital Lake. After your boat ride, have a little walk in Tibetan Market and you can visit the temple. The temple is devoted to Goddess Naina Devi.

title: Same as any other Temple
review: Goddess Naina Devi temple is situated at the end of the Naini Lake which seemed to be named after The Naina Devi. Feelings will be same as you enter any temple in other places except the view of the lake. little crowded both inside the Mandir campus & outside a fancy market with some food shops.

title: Enjoyable ....
review: Nice quite area for worship  .., Easy accessible.  Beside visiting a temple, nice view of lake as well as of the city ..

title: Only for people high on religious index
review: Not much to do here. Nor is the temple sporting any architectural marvels. It is right in the middle of Tibetan market and fails to offer the solitude that I think temple should offer.

title: Devine and full of Serenity
review: Guys this place is a must visit if you are in nainital. Lake side location and ample space in the temple is catchy and you can find solace in the chaos of mall road. You can perform Aarti with the preist and have a glimpse of the aura of Goddess Naina Devi.

title: Temple with a really good view of the lake.
review: Naina goddess temple is a very beautiful temple which has a scenic lake view. The view is awesome. Just outside the temple is the Tibetian market for the shopping sprees out there.

title: Nice cool temple with chilling floors...
review: Very Nice temple just at the lake, I think so Lake is named after Naina Devi..

title: Jai Naina Devi
review: Amazing place to be in Nainital. A very good temple on the banks of Nainital Lake. You can reach the temple from the river (by boating) and by road too (by ricksaw). Those with a spiritual craving should definitely visit the temple. You can get a very good view of Nainital lake and the city from here. Just outside the temple there is Tibettan market from where you can do shopping of winter garments.

title: good temple to see
review: very good and calm place to see maa nayna devi temple in nanital which is on the mall road o nanital.

title: Hindu temple
review: Very nice temple on the bank of Lake. Very nice temple with ample space. View of Lake is also very nice from here. Near by eateries are recommended to check once.

title: Naina Devi Temple
review: The town, Nainital, is named in the name of Goddess Naina Devi. The temple is built at one corner of  naini lake. People, local as well as tourist, visit this temple with great devotion. The ambien of the temple is also great.

title: Spirituality by Naini Lake
review: This temple in red stands on the banks of Naini Lake and is partly responsible for the name 'Nainital'. Brightly coloured boats wait in the lovely waters of the lake, the sound of bells ringing in the ears make this a must visit place to sit back and enjoy the peace.

title: Peaceful, clean and godly
review: The temple is located near the bhutia market in the mallital end of the mall road. The entrance is nearly hidden in one corner and you may have to think if you are on correct way. The temple is kept extremely clean and is a complete peaceful affair . There is a gurd who keeps a watch on the shoes and only asks for "jo upko man mein ho"- anything you feel right. No one irritates you for any donation or any puja. Me and my parents got enough time to slowly visit all the parts of the temple.

title: The tample goddes is Durgamata
review: It is a typical Hindu Temple of godess Durga. The name of the place derive from it. One must visit it although it is not magnificent or heritage kind.

title: Divine and Blissful !!
review: Located at one end of the Nainital Lake , this is the abode of the presiding deity of Nainital and the temple looks over the lake. One has to walk down the Tibetan market or the Boat club road to the temple.

title: Jai ho
review: This is most clean, scenic & peaceful temple I have visited in India. In early 80, we used to go with footwear, now they do not allow. must visit site.

title: Bestowed bliss
review: A great place for sprituality seekers.

title: A very good view of the Lake and forming the soul of Nainital
review: The northern end of Nainital is also known as Mallital. This place forms the heart of the city.Complete with playground, basketball court and an iconic mosque.Loads of shopping and eating out options are also present. You need to take out your shoes to enter the temple space.The temple is adjacent to the lake and this happy area. It provides fantastic view of the lake. It is a small yet peaceful place to enjoy unobstructed view of the lake and the lakeside road!

title: Beautiful temple
review: As this temple is located on nainital lake it had a  beautiful view and luckily we went on the day of diwali so it was well lit with candles and you can easily spend hours there.....aarti gets started at 6.30 pm dnt miss that....

title: Very Very neat and clean worship place.
review: Local people comes for blessings when get married, it is said that Naina Devies eye fell in lake. Very nice arrangements while removing shoes, Management provides wooden chappals.

title: Trip to nainital in diwali 2015
review: Nice and calm temple at the edge of the Naini Lake. The arti at the evening was really nice. Being diwali time the palce was very much full of life and light.

title: Dont visit in rainy season
review: Important place for hindus, must visit when going to Nainital. It is wakable distance from mall road.

title: goddess naina devi
review: It is a temple of a devi maa of nanitaal .holly place quiet and calm and it is nearby to nani lake .

title: nice decent Temple
review: I had visited this place back in 1998, since then nothing much has changed ! Temple is just besides the Lake and is quite well maintained. it neat and clean. just one little issue, they were dumping lots of used/old flowers in the Lake.

title: Place of worship at Nainital
review: Place continuously gets travellers to worship at the Goddess temple with a good view of lake - Nainital.

title: Must visit temple in nainital
review: Situated besides the lake, this is the must visit temple in Nainital.Visited during Navratra , when temple was lighted.

title: Mandir
review: Identified by the way to go on the other side of things to do with the The quiet lake with exquisite surroundings and exotic setting is simply mesmerising. You would feel overwhelmed and captivated completely.

title: Godly
review: If you are travelling to Nainital, this is a must visit temple to complete your trip. Try to attend the aarti in the evening for the best experience.

title: Peaceful experience at Nainadevi temple
review: This temple is located near to local market & at walkable distance from rickshaw station in mallital.very peaceful experience.You can have some good photography in evening time as temple is on bank of lake.

title: Peaceful and Full of positiveness
review: Can be visited anytime during day or evening. specially decorated during festivals. not much crowded during off season

title: Tranquil Dussehra
review: The temple is quite clean & well-maintained, right next to the lake. Pandits won't haggle with you. A peaceful Devi-darshan for the religious minded. Enjoyed the visit.

title: Must do Mandir for blessings
review: This temple on the banks of Naini river has also its attraction. It is quite soothing to get the blessings of Naina Devi. But the only disappointing factor being uncleaniness of our temples. I wish if Swatch Bharat touches our temples too

title: serene experience
review: Beautiful temple situated just near Naini lake alongwith a masjid and a Gurudwara near by. Also closeby to shopping places like Mall road and Tibetian market.

title: Good view of Nainital from this temple
review: The temple periphery touches the Naini lake. One can stand in the temple premises just next to the lake. Fantastic view of Nainital from this point.

title: A heaven at night!
review: A small temple on the bank of Naini lake...Holds a great religious importance...Don't miss the view of the hilly town in the night from the temple...You'll see heaven beneath the sky!!!

title: Very good
review: Very enchanting and peaceful experience. Pure and pious environment. Looks amazing in the night. All day you can listen to the chants.

title: Holy as well as peaceful
review: The place is accessible by two roads. One (called the Thandi Sadak due to the cool because of the shade) does not have motor vehicles allowed; this one also has another couple of smaller temples on the way (pashan-devi was one). The other road is along the mall road and is more 'happening' and crowded.

title: Lake View to Goddess Nainadevi
review: Small place surrounded on three sides by the Naini Lake. Devotees can be found all throughout the day.

title: Must Visit
review: Must visit for all religious people. Very old temple of one of the forms of Goddess Durga.

title: Great visit on a Dasara Day
review: Very centrally located, good divine place, had a peaceful darshan...Good visit...no rush and an easy darshan

title: Nice location of the mandir
review: too crowded market by the sides of the mandir, mandir was worth a visit since it is one of the 51 shakti peeths in our country.

title: Must visit on Nainatal
review: Must visit on Nainatal as a devi shakti peeth. The temple is really small and very beautiful just beside the lake side. Nobody will force you to donate.

title: Pay Homage to the local Goddess
review: Visit it to bring you good luck , peace and harmony. After all the Naini lake is named after her. Remember no shoes ,please its a place of worship..

title: It is one of 51 Shaktipeeths situated in the country
review: Every person who visited Nainital   likes to visit the Goddes Tempkle of Nainidevi.The Temple is situated  near the Gurudwara and on the Bank of Naini llake.

title: Beautiful Place
review: If you are Nanital please do not miss Naina Devi Temple. It is one of the most beautiful place in whole Nainital.

title: Bakti and Beauty Combined
review: The mandir is one of the shakti Peeths. When we went, the crowd was less, The Goddess darshan was awesome. There are also Shiv and Hanuman shrines. The beautiful shiv ling situated very near to the lake is awesome. The view of Shiv ling and the lake together was exotic, out of the world sight. We had Rice puffs with which my little one was feeding fishes in the lake and enjoying. Beautiful Mandir

title: Center of Attraction
review: Nice temple with best of lake views. Properly maintained and easily accessible.Next to Tibetan market so one can enjoy shopping after visiting this temple.

title: Power of Nainital city
review: City Nainital got its name on Name of Naina Devi.

title: The Oldest temple in Nainital
review: The best time to visit is around 7:30-8:00 pm as the maha arti would be going on! This temple is very old and incredible !

title: Beautiful Lakeside Temple
review: This temple is said to be one of the "Shakti Peeth" of Goddess Parvati. The temple is blessed with an ultimate beauty for its on the Lakeside of Naini Lake of Nainital.

title: VERY CLEAN AND WELL MAINTAINED
review: I was really impressed by the level of cleanliness in this lovely temple, Situated right on the famed Naini Lake, it offers a lovely view. No touts or "holy men" distracting you, no beggars, very serene environment, conducive to meditation and prayer. The image if Naina Devi is extremely charming. The priest was very courteous - did not rush us and allowed us to stand in front of the deity and pray as long as we wished.

title: Peace and Serenity!
review: Right next to the lake. This temple is really my favourite place in Nainital for finding internal peace. Must visit!

title: Beautiful temple
review: Temples of many Gods and Goddesses are located in the premises.

title: Holy place to worship
review: The temple,is dedicated to goddess sati and its said that the eyes of sati fell here and since then this place is called naina devi. one must not miss this place while visiting Nainital.

title: For the love of mountain goddess
review: Situated by the Naini taal (lake) this is a small yet beautiful temple of the Mountain Godess Naina devi. During Dussera there is a fair in the vicinity.

title: Enjoyed Durga Puja
review: We visited the temple on "Navmi" day, when the anjali was in progress. Felt really blessed to be a part of the celebrations.

title: Serene--peaceful
review: Located at the edge of naini lake, the serenity is beyond words. Peaceful place to pray and sit and watch the fish on the edge.

title: Naina Devi Temple - By the Lake
review: Naina Devi temple is in the banks of the Naini Lake and close to the Mall Road . There is a Gurudwara besides the Temple and a small Tibbet Market outside the Temple . Good momos are available outside in small eateries .If you are in Nainital visit this Temple for sure.

title: Can go once
review: Can go once just because going to Nainital.  Very crowded at times.  Nainital as such is a nice place.

title: truly divine experience
review: The visit to this place is truly divine sine there is a serene silence in midst of all the chatter of the ocean of humanity. you will feel a beautiful calm that prevails over you .

title: Good Trip of Nainital
review: Hi All

title: Naina devi temple...must visit during evening Aarti-time.
review: I visited Nainital in monsoons, reached Naina Devi temple in the evening right at the start of aarti at the temple...another divine experience. Naina Devi temple is alongside the Naini lake (close to Gurudwara). The temple is beautifully lit up during evening and night. There are two huge bells ('bade wale ghante' in hindi) in the temple which are rang during the Aarti which create a lot of sound.

title: Good temple
review: It is naina devi temple and it is at walking distance from the naini lake. You can do street shopping while going through the road.

title: naina devi mela
review: old temple of naina devi a form of godess durga ,went there on the pooja day was welcomed by dances from local community city was in festive mood .

title: temple at nice location
review: the temple is situated at such a location that it must be visited by almost every tourist in nainital. situated at the side of the naini lake. the famous tibetan market for shopping starts from this temple.

title: Hindu shrine
review: The temple is excellent . It is a hindu shrine . One can offer prayers to goddess . Pieceful place near lace.

title: Peaceful visit
review: We went in the evening. We were able to worship in a very peaceful manner where no one was there to push you in queues. It has got Hanuman temple and other shivlinga etc in its premises. My frnd clicked selfie with Hanuman :P

title: must listen the story behind the goddess temple.
review: When we are in Nainital must visit to this temple. It is situated in centre of the city, near market & lake.

title: Nyc temple with Naini lake at its back.
review: Good exp. You can sit in the temple and enjoy the surroundings. Though in the evening it become little crowded.

title: Nice Place for Spiritualists
review: If you are a person with spiritual values,then this place is ideal for you,as there are many temples around here.You can also view Naini Lake from here.

title: Very good
review: Very famous temple of Naina Devi which is very devine and you will feel good which is located just at the corner of nani lake

title: Calm place
review: Nice temple with calmness and situated at a place where you get magnificent views of the lake and hills surrounding it. Just on the Naina lake besides Tibetian market, you will have more shops to visit when you come out. Mind it that the stuff sold there is the one taken from Delhi itself. Tibetian markets in Delhi seems better :)

title: Beautiful
review: Small temple near the Lake associated with strong belief of the Local peoples Beautiful. A must visit.

title: Maha Maya living here peacefully and her shakti always is with devotees.
review: One of the Holy Siddh Peeth of Goddess Naina, rich in ashirvaad, grasped by enthuastic visitors/devotees of MAA. Here every manokamna can be fulfilled, if you have faith. Ladies are restricted to visit here in secured days i.e.(Monthly Period).

title: must go place...
review: good temple along lake side... lake view is really nice from the temple... ita a must go place.... dont forget to try strawberry n mulberry ..really fresh n yummy in nainital...n chana chat

title: Calm and Peaceful
review: Beautifully located on the lakeside offers some awesome views of Nainital lake apart from divine blessings from goddess!

title: A PIOUS MEMORY
review: A very beautiful temple and the place is very scenic. Place is very calm and peaceful.good to go one for the Darshan.

title: Felt nice and blessed
review: A visit to Nainital is incomplete without visiting the Naina Devi Temple. This temple is devoted to "Eyes" of "Sati" (Goddess Durga). We were there for the evening Aarti after the Boat ride and loved the entire ambience of that place.

title: Holy Temple of Shree Naina Devi
review: Very holy place on bank of Naini Lake. Very good Darshana of Naina Devi. If possible, one must try to attend evening Aarati in temple, its very holy experience.

title: The Legal Goddess
review: She is the truly a Goddess who is considered powerful. What you like is the magnetism she exudes across the legal community with wills, legal stamp papers etc all tied up. Waiting for her blessings. One word of caution: Be careful about monkeys if you have food or prasad in hand.

title: very holy place
review: Its a very old temple of goddess NAINA DEVI , situated very close to naini jheel . must go once, a small Bazaar behind the temple also craze you to buy some candles

title: Blissful !
review: Absolute Bliss ! We paid homage to Goddess Naina & other dieties, the temple is well maintained and situated in immediatte vicinity to Naini Lake.

title: a must visit place in nainital
review: You should visit the temple if you are visiting nainital, the temple i can say is a happening place just near to lack, you can see lot of fishes in lack from here, as well as it is near to market, so same time you can explore the market.

title: The Ruling Goddess of Nainital
review: A must visit temple for all visitors to Nainital... I cant rate rate any temple less than 5 star... I can rate the facilities/upkeep of the temple

title: must see
review: Situated at the edge of the lake, opposite of the bus stop and next to the parking lot. Do visit, and follow up with a walk across the other side of the lake

title: temple on the banks of lake
review: Naina devi temple is clean and on the banks of the lake. there is also a shiva temple and a hunaman idol at the entrance of the temple

title: Very AUSPICIOUS TEMPLE SEEN
review: Very nice/ cool/ peace ful temple seen in our life. worth to visit. and near by so many shops and bazzars....tibetian mkt also there... must visit... it is nearby Naini lake.

title: Devotional Goddess Naina Devi Temple
review: Goddess Naina Devi temple is on the bank of Naini jheel itself, walking distance and is srounded by small shops & restaurants and is nearby parking.  This temple is very old and devotee must visit to this temple as it gives good feeling.

title: Naina devi
review: Naina devi temple is very clean and beautiful temple. naina devi temple on banks of the naini leak. must visit...

title: temple darshan
review: Very clean temple and the location is awesome. Attend the Aarti in the evening for a thrilling spiritual experience.

title: On the edge on the lake
review: Well maintained temple complex. Very clean. THe temple is right next to the Tibetian market were one can buy souvenirs such as candles. Toys, clothes and perfumes are also avaiable at a reasonable price.

title: One hill station I found not spoilt commercially even after 28 years
review: Beautiful place by the side of the lake. Though a bit crowded. Comparatively clean. One can take boat rides from the temple premises.

title: presence of goddess
review: I visited nanital in december, I had a wonderful snowfall experience there, on this snowy day I came to visit this temple without any protection on my foot, I felt the presence of goddess.

title: A true legend
review: One of the holy Shrines of Goddess Sati. It is believed that the tears of the deity had fallen at this ground that caused a lake to appear. Also the temple is built to pay homage to the great goddess. A true legend is the saga of this place. A must visit place for every holy and religious person.

title: Naina Devi temple a very neat and clean temple just beside the Tallital
review: If one is at Nainital after visiting all other places should come to Naina Devi Temple which is on one side of Tallital.A very beautiful place.The temple is very neatly kept and arranged.There are different sizes of gongs ( ghants) which you can ring them and every one gives a different sound.There are no pandas , one may just to buy a plate for puja before entering the temple take the same to the main mandir , the purohit takes it chants some mantras and returns back.After you have visited the temple you can take a look at the Tibetian Market adjacent to the Mandir.You can also pay a visit to the Gurudwara just beside Naina Devi's temple.

title: visit temple when you go to Nainital
review: Nice clean temple, right in front of Naini lake.

title: Naina Devi Temple.
review: One of the oldest temple in Nainital just at Naini Lake. Must visit here for a peace.

title: Peacful
review: Located on one side of the Naini Lake. It is an important attraction of Nainital and also located next to Tibetan market.

title: Temple with amazing view.
review: "Nainital", "Naini" + "Taal". Naini comes from this temple, "Naina" devi temple which is situated on one side corner of the lake giving you most soothing views of lake (taal).

title: MAA NAINA DEVI TEMPLE
review: Very peacefull place. Every one to go there. Naina devi is a saktipeeth of maa sati. It is describe in the holy books that when maa sati enter in the kund. Shiv took her body and travel across the world. And in the mean time one eye of masati fell down in nainital and another in tara devi in himachal pradesh. Si its a holy place and it gives us positive energy.in the tample premises a giant statu of maha bali HANUMAN is there. Wihich also an attaraction  of devoties.

title: Jai ho Maa Naina Devi
review: Must visit temple near mallital stadium excellent view of the lake and the city on a bright sunny day. Visiting early in the morning will make you feel blissful.

title: Great temple at the banks of Naini Lake
review: Great place must visit if in Nainital. The temple is very very beautiful and from the open yard of the temple you can have a best view of the lake and nainital hills

title: good temple
review: The temple is neat and clean Few more temples are inside that campus. It is in the heart of city and Naini Lake beautify it more

title: Jai Mata Di
review: Situated in Mallital. A must Visit place to go. It Comes in Top Ten Attraction in Nainital. Great View of Nainital from This Temple.

title: Relaxing and spritual
review: Good to pay visit to this temple just located just beside the Naini lake. Devoted to goddess Naina Devi, you can see the whole lake and can sit here for hours for relaxing.

title: Goddess of the Lake town
review: The Goddess Naina Devi temple at the northern end of the Naini Lake is a liberating experience. The temple is dedicated to Sati. After darshan to the deity a stroll in the temple complex offers beautiful views of the Naini Lake. One can spend long hours in the temple complex feeling one with the creator and protector.

title: A temple one must visit when in Nainital.
review: Naina Devi Temple is on the bank of Naini lake and is at walking distance from the bus station. One could feed the fishes while coming out of the temple. There also a small market with several shops selling souvenirs and other utility products, it also has a few economy restaurants serving Indian food.

title: Calmness
review: Every person visiting Nanital must visit this holy temple. I make sure that during my every trip to Nanital, I must go there once. Its beautiful and on the banks of Naini Lake.

title: Holly place
review: Must visit place if you visiting Nainital. Give peace of mind and nearby beauty is amazing. Walking distance from city centre. enjoy

title: Beautiful and tranquil
review: The temple, located at one of the corners of the lake at the foothill, has vibrant colors. It gives a sense of calmness and spirituality.

title: Excellent  Temple
review: Off late we visited this temple. It is quite serene, well maintained. We enjoyed the atmosphere. The view of naini lake is excellent from this point. I should rank # 1 spot in nainital. Each and every one should visit this temple.

title: Powerful Temple
review: It is very old, powerful & high vibration place. One should visit this temple when you are in Nainital. It is land mark of Nainital.

title: Visit to Nainital ....
review: The Only temple and star attraction of Nainital ...Naina devi temple ... Peacedul near the lakeside ...u can even offer food to fishes there... and temple is neat n clean and later u can even visit the tibet market .....Its awesume

title: Calm quite  Temple
review: Excellent, neat & Clean, with no pestering priests. Lovely place to sit down & have a breather. The temple gives a stunning view of the entire lake.   A beautiful statue of Goddess Naina Devi , the protecting godess of Nainital and Lord Hanuman.

title: THE SUBLIME GODDESS
review: The temple, on the banks of the Nainital Lake, has images of Naina Devi, Lakshmi and Saraswati. There is also an altar for Shiva and Hanuman. The terrace adjoining the temple is a tourist's delight

title: Nice Temple
review: Nice and calm temple on the banks of Naini Lake. Place is clean and has excellent lake view. Must visit place while in Nainital.

title: MUST VISIT THIS TEMPLE
review: This temple is very old and is of hreat historial importance.

title: peaceful
review: This place is peaceful and spacious. One can spend some time here enjoying the beauty or worshiping goddess Sati.

title: Must go
review: A very good temple at nice view of lake the place surrounded by tibbati market and you can find a lot of wood and candles crafts there

title: Temple on lake side
review: Naina devi temple near lake side. From here you can watch the boats on naini lake. There is also a gurudwara near it.

title: Beautiful
review: Built around Naini Lake..the temple gives you a mesmerising view of Nainital City. You can enjoy street food around temple as well as go for shopping in the market adjacent to temple.

title: Seren , clean, well-maintained - MUST visit
review: Right at the corner of lake, this ancient temple offers the same relief and peace as it used to 30 yrs ago. Lots of locals and tourist visit from morning till evening. You get down from the boat, take some 7-8 steps (very high ones, not easy for elders), take a right and enter the local market leading to temple entrance.

title: Please visit
review: At one end of the Naina Lake is the Naina Devi temple.  It adjoins the Tibetan market and is the gateway to Thandi Sadak.

title: Nicely maintained temple
review: The temple is very clean, nicely maintained with a wonderful view of the lake. Must go there in the evening to enjoy some picture perfect view

title: Uphill Class
review: Up hill you will go by a trolly service and you are surely gonna enjoy the view of the Bhakhra Dam and the Govind Sagar view from top here. Very nice and divine place it is.

title: Clean and beautiful.
review: Naina Devi Temple is on the flat near car parking and opposite to Capitol cinema. Very clean and nicely maintained. Even if you are not very religious the location and beauty of the place will make you joyful. Facing the lake it also gives the panoramic view of the lake. Near by is Gurudwara and a mosque as well. For shopping Tibetan market and for snacks lot of shops. You can spend hours at this place.

title: Neat & Clean place free from ponga pandits
review: This temple is close to naini lake and is easily accessible. Temple is good and best part is that despite being famous, there are no pandits fooling you in any pretext. There are beautiful forest handmade products available outside. You really need to bargain a lot for a reasonable deal.

title: Pilgrimage to Ma Naina Devi Temple
review: Visit to NainiTal is incomplete without a visit to Ma Naina Devi Temple.This is Shakti Peeth and legend says that the eyes of Goddess Parvati fell here,hence the name Naina Devi,after whom Naini Tal district got it's name.The temple is on Thandi Sarak,very close to the Boat House Club and on the Flats,where tourists come for walks and shopping at the Tibetan Market.

title: Nice temple on the bank of Naini lake
review: The temple is worth visiting .The temple is close to mall road.Clean and have small sitting place where people can sit and relax.

title: No hassles darshan.
review: Goddess Naina Devi temple is situated at one end of the nainital lake. It is one of the 52 siddh peeths where, as per hindu mythology, Sati's eye fell, creating the lake and giving it its unique shape. There is no harrassment or coersion here. Simply go and do the puja. No one demands anything ( a far cry from Kalighat temple in Kolkata, another one of the siddh peeths). One can just stand and take the lake and the sorrounding hills in. Walk along the path or take a boat ride. Very pleasant experience.

title: Peace and Tranquility
review: A place where ones gets peace of mind and tranquility. The temple is located at one end of Nainital lake. The entry to the temple is through a tibetian market where one can do lot of different shopping like dress, Jackets, Toys etc.

title: Divine
review: Naina devi located right next to the lake is dedicated to goddess parvati. It is believed that the eyes of Sati fell here and hence the name Naina.

title: Temple near the lake
review: It's a temple situated near the lake.  Not aware whether it has some historic signifcance as is there various temples of Goddesses in India

title: Blessings for Anniversary
review: So we were there to celebrate our second wedding anniversary in this beautiful, little, romantic hill station. So seeking the blessings of Naina Devi was indeed a must. A beautiful temple situated on the shore of the "Taal", its really beautiful and a must- visit place when in nainital.

title: Naina Devi Temple
review: The temple of Goddess Naina Devi is at the banks of the Naini Lake. The temple is a nice and pleasant visit for travelers as the priests are not that money hungry compared to the other temples of Uttrakhand. There is peace and tranquility in the temple premises.

title: Nice tample
review: Beautiful temple next to Bhotia market. very peaceful atmosphere. evening lighting are very attractive.

title: Jai Maa
review: Hello, this temple is on the side of the lake and there are other temples inside the temple premises. There is shopping around it too.

title: Divine
review: Naina devi temple is at a height and therefore provide a great scenic view from the temple. The temple is clean and does not take much time to do the "darshan". I chose the morning hours at the weather is nice.

title: Naina devi
review: very serene and beautiful temple

title: Jai mata di
review: Right on the lake front, next to the thandi sadak is where the temple is.

title: Excellent location
review: Just by the lake side, its a good place to visit for spiritual as well as from a scenic point of view. especially choose the morning hours when its at its best.

title: Truly divine
review: The place Nainital got its name from the Godess. The temple it at the mountain so you need to take steps to reach the temple. It does not take much time to do darchan at the temple. Being on height, the view from the temple is majestic. With beautiful lake nearby and mountain range, the view from the temple is awesome.

title: Near to Tibetan Bazar
review: You can visit this at the time of your visit to Tibetan Bazar.  This is main temple where Eye of Godess Sati was said to have fallen, which is must see place, which is on the banks of Nainital lake.

title: Must Visit
review: Just adjacent to the Naini Lake and local ppl have lot of faith in this deity, one should visit this place as it is said that the deity fulfills all the wishes of the person who prays here

title: Pure devotion...
review: Once you enter the temple, you feel the peace. The temple's scenic beauty is marvelous as it is surrounded by Govind Sagar lake and Bharka Dam

title: nanda devi temple
review: Maa nanda devi tample are situated in malli tall nainital..... Very big temple.... People says your wishes are fulfil in this temple..... So i beleve in god and i take wish in this temple

title: Naina Devi beside Naini Lake
review: Nice view of lake & hills. Sunset must be captured. The temple is nice. Bhutia Bazar just beside it is a good place to shop woollen garments after a lot of bargaining.

title: Great location
review: Naina Devi Temple is situated at a wonderful location. You can just sit and experience the breeze from the lake. You have a great view of the lake which makes the entire experience beautiful. A great place to sit, relax and meditate.

title: Got blessed
review: Got blessed. Easy darshan.

title: VISITORS TURN DEVOTEES HERE
review: Nainital is a place for holiday; but the temple on the side of the lake is something one can't miss. Small but attractive . Goddedss Naini is the ruling deity of Nainital and is accompanied by a Hanuman temple. It is close to the Gurudwar on its backyard on the lake side.

title: May be a visit when u jump before the boat ride
review: A temple and do not expect much. But neatly maintained. Before you walk to the boat ride you see this place or after the Tibetan market.

title: Goddess besides the lake
review: Temple is just beside the lake and gives a very nice view of the lake. Its a very old temple but doesnt looks like tht. Way to temple is via Bhutia market.

title: Very cute temple
review: it is very nice cute temple with good bell structures overlooking the naini lake. From the temple you should watch the fishes in the lake which is very nice to take photos...

title: Trully a Divine Experience
review: Its difficult to describe a spiritual feeling. But the power of this shrine is immense. Your trip to Nainital will not be complete without a visit to this temple.

title: temple with nice location...
review: For a devotee, it is a temple. Period.

title: VISIT TO NAINADEVI ENHANCES YOUR FAITH ON GOD......truly divine.....
review: Situated at  a wonderful location by the side of Nainital lake,  is  a place where you will have the dharsan of Nainadevi , with a nice view of the lake and the Nainital city. One of the shakti peeth ,a place not to be missed,when you visit Nainital....

title: Serene temple with no pandit hassle and no one trying to fleece you
review: You can sit there for hours. It is facing the lake and extremely clean. Easily accessible from the main city market, walking distance from the taxi stand. There is no queue to enter and no devotee rush. So the experience of praying to Maa Naina is divine.

title: peace full place
review: very good non comperable place. tibbatyan market is another attraction after getting darshan one must visit this place . it is very clean and safe as well

title: Small & Beautiful Temple
review: The very famous temple of Naina Devi is another must visit in nainital, The belief is she was the wife of Lord Krishna. The temple is small & very beautiful,Just adjoining to the Naina lake.

title: A marvellous temple
review: Right on the egde of the Nainital lake, the Goddess Naina Devi temple is a must visit for all those visiting Nainital.

title: Naina devi temple
review: The charming hills resort of Nainital gets its name from the Goddess Naina Devi. Finding it's ways from the Kushan Period, popularly known as Nanda or Naina Devi in the Kumaon region, an ancient temple is understood to have been built in the 15th century A.D., which might have destroyed in a landslide.

title: Serene and refreshing experience
review: The Naina Devi temple is a beautiful temple situated next to the lake dedicated to the local goddess. Its a very peaceful and serene place. Visiting during the evening aarti, around 6pm further enhances the experience.

title: Blissfull Feel
review: the area outside the temple is a little commercialised.

title: Inspiring
review: Naina means eye, and and taal means lake - and thus the place named as Nainital. It was some 500 steps from our hotel at Nainital to reach Naina Devi Temple. Under cool bridge, me and my wife taking off our shoes entered the arena. The lake, the devotees and above all the divinely feelings almost hypnotized us and we stayed there for several minutes to quench our thrust of having blessings from the God.

title: Very Peaceful Location and heart breaking view of Naini Lake
